messages.subject: a few small things
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been doing a little housekeeping on the list and wanted to keep everyone updated: I ve added a couple new moderators to the list: Schuyler and Joyce,
messages.messageBody:
I've been doing a little "housekeeping" on the list and wanted to keep everyone updated:

I've added a couple new moderators to the list: Schuyler and Joyce, both of whom have been around the list for awhile and always have wonderful input. Thanks y'all for helping out!

I've also recently updated the list guidelines and changed the description on the home page to make it clearer that the list's focus is whole life/ radical unschooling. Hopefully that will avert some confusion! The list guidelines are in the "files" section here:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/files/

if you want to check them - they haven't changed all that much, I promise. The short form is: write gently, read gently and Trim Your Posts!

Thank y'all
Meredith (co-owner, Unschooling Basics)
